original_text: When Korah had gathered all his followers in opposition to them at the entrance to the tent of meeting, the glory of the Lord appeared to the entire assembly.
korean_text: 고라가 온 회중을 회막 문에 모아 놓고 그 두 사람을 대적하려 하매 여호와의 영광이 온 회중에게 나타나시니라

sentences.original_text: When Korah had gathered all his followers
sentences.korean_translation: 고라가 그의 모든 추종자들을 모았을 때

sentences.original_text: at the entrance to the tent of meeting
the glory of the Lord appeared
